comment: I took AP Statistics in high school and took this class online to get credit for Georgia Tech and I loved it. It was super easy to follow and the professor was super sweet when I asked for help! The quizzes are not bad at all and the exams look just like the practice/quizzes/homework. Make sure to do the practice exam if you don't feel confident.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--EXTRA CREDIT--Test heavy

comment: Great Prof! Very flexible and straightforward lectures. Tons of EC.
THE BEST STATS professor I could have ever asked for. If you can take her, please do. She always cracks jokes and makes class interesting each week.

For each chapter there is a ALEKS homework and quiz. There are 4 exams including the final on ALEKS, and one gets dropped. One HW and one quiz gets dropped as well. Professor Amoakon explains stats in a way where you're able to understand -- she's also very nice. There are many extra credit opportunities so make sure to attend class.

This class is super easy and the professor is really nice! All of the exams are on a lockdown browser, but they're open note. All of the assignments are on R Studio, but you don't need to know any programming or anything. I highly recommend this professor!

Literally the EASIEST class I have ever taken. All tests/quizzes are open-note and done at home. She's super easy-going and understanding. I took this class along with Calc 1, Chem 2+Lab, and Bio2+Lab. This class turned out to be the easiest of the two. I 1000000% rec her. You WILL pass no matter what. Shes like Thomas Garr (iykyk) but for Biostats

I would say she's great at teaching it slowly and understandably. Uses Quizzizz as a way to keep up with participation and attendance, and easy grades. Tests are on your own and open notes. She can be late to class sometimes (once was almost 45 minutes late). But overall, she teaches at a pace that's easy to understand the material.

her biostats class is basically just stat 1401 + learning how to use R studio. No lockdown + open note tests and all assignments are online. Extremely easy as long as you don't forget any assignments. And the class ends early too, which is even cooler.

Professor Amoakon was a great statistics professor! Use those helping days she gives if you're having trouble understanding! She is a fast talker with a accent, so be sure to pay attention because it got confusing for me in the beginning! Make sure to participate as it counts for a bonus in your final grade!

impossible to do bad, if you show up to class you can get participation points, and she curves grades and sometimes waives stuff you did not do. Please take her for Stat 1401 or any class she teaches. She also gives so much extra credit and is extremely nice.

Super sweet and funny professor! She is so easy to talk to and takes time to explain anything. The class was fairly easy and all the content she taught was engaging. The class would consist of engaging on Quizizz (participation grade). There is two assignments for each module and 2 quizzes for each module. Please take her if you need this class.

Professor Amoakon is such a great professor! DATA 1501 is an extremely hands on class that may be challenging at times, but professor Amoakon is great at giving tutorials on how to do the Excel spreadsheets as well as being very understanding if you are struggling in her class. If she sees you put in effort, you will get a good grade in the class.

The most caring professor I have had! The subject of data science was challenging, but her willingness to help, accessibility outside of class, opportunities for EC, and leniency on quizzes + assignments made the experience so much better. I would have ended with an 83, but she boosted me to a 90! Definitely recommend taking her for stats or data!

Lythia is a great teacher for this course. The coursework is heavy, but she is extremely helpful and available (tip: go to office hours). She is light-hearted and laid-back. She is a great teacher who made the class both manageable and breathable. I highly recommend her.

Professor Amoakon is an amazing professor. She does have a thick accent, but truly cares about her students best interest. She offers SO much extra credit and everything is through Quizziz and Aleks. She makes sure that help is offered since class can be confusing but she is an amazing teacher and amazing person. Highly recommend for Stats!

She genuinely cares about her students and their grades-- YOU WILL PASS IF YOU USE THE RESOURCES SHE PROVIDES! So many extra credit opportunities, her practice tests are VERY helpful. The (weekly) homework is very helpful and will prob be your primary source. She highly encourages questions and will make sure everyone understands.
She was so amazing and helpful!!! Never made you feel bad about asking questions and made sure all guidelines were understood. Would definitely recommend her for 1401

I loved this professor. Her instructions are always super clear, and she gives you so many extra credit options. The tests are online, and you can use a note card. She also is great at explaining concepts. She made sure that everyone understood everything before the test. She also uses Quizzez as a way to do in class questions. Great teacher!!

You should receive an A. She offers so much extra credit. If you have a high B or an A you can exempt the final if you choose. You mainly learn everything from Aleks since she is not the best at explaining things and she has a thick accent, but either way you should pass.

a very good professor who actually cares about her students passing! offers MANY extra credit opportunities, attendance is a grade but trust me as long as you attend class and put effort in, YOU WILL PASS. no beating around the bush, teaches the exact material that you will see on quizzes/exams. final will be waived if you have an A in the class.

She is amazing! I hate anything math but she made this so easy and accessible for me! Make sure to come to class and do the extra credits. We had so many opportunities for extra credit that I failed an exam but still got an A. She will work with you! She waives the final exam too if you have good grades!

This professor is amazing. She made sure everyone that attended class would understand every concept that was required to learn. The notes covers everything on on the test. Also, in class the quizzes are for participation and is an easy extra credit. Her teaching style is great, and getting an A in the class is not hard if you try.

She is a very passionate, smart teacher. She offers tons of extra credit opportunities. She will let you exempt the final if your grade is high enough! We do Quizizz every day for attendance and practice but make sure you answer fast because she never gives enough time to answer the questions. Overall, great teacher. She wants you to succeed.

Professor Amoakon was AMAZING. She assigned a quizzes every class, which counted as attendance/participation. This was just graded on completion, not accuracy. PRACTICE TESTS ARE ALMOST EXACTLY LIKE THE TEST!!!!! And she gives SO MUCH EXTRA CREDIT!!!  Overall, she is a GREAT professor and is super understanding! Great professor, 10/10.

Professor Amoakon has been an amazing professor. She gives practice exams that are EXACTLY like the tests. She gives 15-20 points of extra credit for participating in class, in the quizizz, and for even showing up to class. If you're not good at math, this class wont be easy for you but she'll definitely help you get the grade you want.

She's a cool teacher with a light accent. She does her classes by using the notes and quizzes so if you go over the notes you will understand the class. Also if you do the homework on ALEKS it will tell you how to do the math so you'll understand it in class too. Pretty simple class, not exactly easy. Also ask questions she likes to answer them

Wonderful teacher. Love her teaching style, VERY clear and concise. Up to 15+ points of extra credit for exams. Quizizz used for attendance, DO THEM! She wants to make sure everyone understands, and asks often. Don't be afraid to ask questions! She does have a thick accent, so if you struggle with hearing through accents this class is not for you!

Easy statistics class as long as you pay attention and study. Attendance is mandatory. Gives bonus points, extra credit, and participation points before exams. You play a Quizziz during class that counts as your attendance. Has an accent, so if you have a hard time understanding accents, that's something to note. I would take her class again!
